movies.title: Victoria & Abdul
movies.plot: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 11 nominations.

events.title: Abdul Karim delivers a mohur gold coin to Queen Victoria

movies.title: Mary Queen of Scots
movies.plot: In 1561, Mary Stuart, widow of the King of France, returns to Scotland, reclaims her rightful throne and menaces the future of Queen Elizabeth I as ruler of England, because she has a legitimate claim to the English throne. Betrayals, rebellions, conspiracies and their own life choices imperil both Queens. They experience the bitter cost of power, until their tragic fate is finally fulfilled.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 27 nominations.

events.title: Mary returns to Scotland to rule the country

movies.title: Darkest Hour
movies.plot: A thrilling and inspiring true story begins on the eve of World War II as, within days of becoming Prime Minister of Great Britain, Winston Churchill must face one of his most turbulent and defining trials: exploring a negotiated peace treaty with Nazi Germany, or standing firm to fight for the ideals, liberty and freedom of a nation. As the unstoppable Nazi forces roll across Western Europe and the threat of invasion is imminent, and with an unprepared public, a skeptical King, and his own party plotting against him, Churchill must withstand his darkest hour, rally a nation, and attempt to change the course of world history.

events.title: Churchill gives his "We Shall Fight on the Beaches" speech

movies.title: The Grinch
movies.plot: The Grinch hatches a scheme to ruin Christmas when the residents of Whoville plan their annual holiday celebration.

events.title: Cindy Lou tries to visit Santa Claus
the Grinch attempts to sabotage Whoville's tree lighting ceremony
